content: Howdy!! My name is Carter Brock. I hail from Plano Texas, went to Frisco liberty high school, and I am going to be a sophomore business major. Some things in life that get me really excited are sports, history, and trivia, and one of my biggest pet peeves is bright screens. I was a fish camp counselor in A Blue Camp Shipley and Im also involved with 12th Man Productions! Canâ€™t wait to meet more people.
name: Carter Brock
